name: Escape Tales World
description:
Escape Granny House:Platformer Adventure - block game in arcade style with cool music and sounds! Find all keys to open all doors to wonderland tales! escape granny house to free yourself from granny tales mystery! Escape all levels - granny maze , granny spawn kitchen crazy! Escape all traps in granny house

Product feature bullets

English (U.S.) Up to 10 key features of your app, one feature per line. These features will appear on the Appstore website, formatted as a bulleted list. • granny tales world • blocky character to play • fun sounds and music • big world to explore • traps
